oracle.pg.common

Interface OracleEdgeBase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element, OracleElementBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OracleEdge

    public interface OracleEdgeBase
extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Edge, OracleElementBase
    This class implements the Blueprints Edge and Edge interface by using one of the supported backend database.

    • Method Summary
